attributes.action: Nationalise the East Coast Mainline and run it properly (unlike GNER and National Express have done).
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
GNER were running it, folded and had to hand it back.
National Express took over and have put up prices, put up prices again and now are starting to charge £2.50 per journey to reserve a seat!

Lets get the railways running like they used to, start by nationalising the East Coast Mainline (ECML) and run it properly.
